html: The rebirth or re-creation of Jehovah’s people on higher spiritual levels—for which their descent phase through adversity prepared them—ultimately brings about the rebirth or re-creation of the earth itself. As the ascent of righteous individuals such as Jehovah’s seraphs-servants directly impacts the ascent of a new nation of Jehovah’s people to exalted spiritual categories, so the parallel ascent of the earth to a paradisiacal glory leads to its positioning in a new or higher heavens. The state of joy that characterizes this development so transforms its participants that it permeates their whole existence.
